name: The Exorcist
description: You are a young exorcist Alonso that starts a dangerous adventure. You will face the real evil - Sargatans. A bloodthirsty and terrible demon has challenged you, and now you need to start your own investigation by pursuing him. In "The Exorcist" you will be scared, so much scared...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated or higher DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated or higher
